title: EYL #162 Davido on Afrobeats, Nigeria, & Family of Billionaires
itunes:title: EYL #162 Davido on Afrobeats, Nigeria, & Family of Billionaires
description:
A few weeks ago we made history by traveling to Nigeria to shoot content and host a networking event. We interviewed one of the top Afrobeat artists in the world Davido.


This conversation was much more than music. We spoke about business in Africa, his involvement in several tech startups on the continent, the political climate in Nigeria, civil unrest, his father who’s a billionaire, and his uncle who’s the richest black person in the world, and more. #davido #nigeria #afrobeats 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https: https://instagram.com/davido?utm_medium=copy_link

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
